channel.title: [PI]RuneX-Gaming 317 - Fixed - Stable - Allot of bugs Fixed [No anti-Leech]
channel.description:
HI,I am Quadro From RuneX-GAming Server That was Open 12 Weeks Ago. They was a big succed About That server but now they closed it. The server was a great PI with alot of bugs fixed. so i have the source and client of RuneX-GAming so i want release it and so here it is.
RuneX-Gaming Server RSPS Its Old Rune-Fusion Server That was made by Valantino and Rene But high edited by: Quadro
Downloads
Source: http://www.mediafire.com/?646eivdqjo8k763
Client: http://www.mediafire.com/?l3o6p7iuahxco8b
Features:
-Perfect Hybridding -All 474 Items -Working 474 Godwars with all bosses and correct animation! -Good ingame Graphics! -All Special Attacks Coded! -Correct 474 Stance! -Ancients, Lunar and Regular Magic! -Many PK Spots! -100% Dueling and Staking! -Skillcapes Working -Dueling with Staking 100% -Pest Control -TzTok-Jad -All working skills! -Barrows (for Barrows armour) -Slayer Tower (Two floors) -New Option Tab -10xhit (Optional) -Names abouve heads (Optional) - And More!!!
Pictures: Sorry no time to get pictures Credits:
50% Valantino 50% Rene eats waffl3z
Please dont post Stupid Comments.
No Anti-Leech!
